title: About
author: Steven Ng
__content: # Who Am I? Braintapper is me, Steven Ng. I'm a technology consultant, and the main tools I've been working with recently include: * Cognos 11.1.x * Pentaho Data Integration * Svelte.js * NodeJS * Electron * Ruby on Rails I've got an extensive background in business intelligence and web development. It may seem like a strange combination at first, but they're more related than one might think. Contact: information@braintapper.com ## Links * [Github](https://github.com/braintapper?tab=repositories) * [NPMJS](https://www.npmjs.com/~braintapper) * [Linked In](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stevenhng/) # Privacy Policy This web site is hosted on [Github Pages](https://pages.github.com/). Please note that GitHub may collect information from visitors to this site, including logs of visitor IP addresses, to comply with legal obligations, and to maintain the security and integrity of the site and service. Traffic on this web site is tracked using Google Analytics. This involves the use of cookies to allow us to analyze trends, administer the site, track visitor movements around the site, and gather demographic information about our site's visitors. You may control the use of cookies at the browser level. If you choose to disable cookies, it will also disable any associated tracking related to the cookies we use.
html:
Who Am I?

Braintapper is me, Steven Ng.

I'm a technology consultant, and the main tools I've been working with recently include:

  • Cognos 11.1.x
  • Pentaho Data Integration
  • Svelte.js
  • NodeJS
  • Electron
  • Ruby on Rails

I've got an extensive background in business intelligence and web development. It may seem like a strange combination at first, but they're more related than one might think.

Contact: information@braintapper.com

Links

  • Github
  • NPMJS
  • Linked In

Privacy Policy

This web site is hosted on Github Pages. Please note that GitHub may collect information from visitors to this site, including logs of visitor IP addresses, to comply with legal obligations, and to maintain the security and integrity of the site and service.

Traffic on this web site is tracked using Google Analytics. This involves the use of cookies to allow us to analyze trends, administer the site, track visitor movements around the site, and gather demographic information about our site's visitors. You may control the use of cookies at the browser level. If you choose to disable cookies, it will also disable any associated tracking related to the cookies we use.
